readability_reflection: I found concatenation a little more readable because the + allows me to know when something ends and begins.
comprehension_debugging: Concatenation heleps me quickly understand the debug, becuase without the "" marks, the + would not output, so it allows me to break down each part of the code.
preference_rationale: I would use string concatenation because the plus symbol stands out in the code, and you can make it a little more readable
learning_curve: I prioritized experience more than familiarity and going through I was able to easily identify concatenation much easier than string interpolation.
suggestions_improvement: Just make it a little cleaner when writing a big code
